primitiveValues.textValue: How do I recover a missing cryptodeposit?

ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How do I recover a missing cryptodeposit?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To begin, please provide the following details:

  • Deposit amount
  • Currency
  • TXID/Hash
  • Blockchain network used
  • Ticket ID of the deposit (7-digit number)

To find the Ticket ID, go to your Transaction History, select Deposit, and locate the 7-digit number associated with your transaction.

If you cannot find your Ticket ID, please fill out the Missing Deposit Form with the Transaction ID (TXID) and the exact amount of crypto shown on the blockchain (not the dollar value).

You can access the Missing Deposit Form here: https://kst.mr/S1EHH1uwo

Our Deposit Recovery Form BETA is intended for cryptocurrency deposits that require recovery.

Please follow these steps to upload the details of your deposit for recovery:

  1. Login to NDAX
  2. Click the NDAX SYMBOL in the top left-hand corner
  3. Select WALLET from the dropdown menu
  4. Select the Cryptocurrency you wish to recover
  5. Click MISSING DEPOSIT at the bottom of the screen
  6. Enter the AMOUNT and TRANSACTION ID
  7. Upload an IMAGE or VIDEO of your transaction record from your external wallet to validate authenticity
  8. Click SUBMIT

Note: If you deposited an unsupported asset, our team will review your request and notify you if recovery is possible (if eligible).

Once you submit the crypto deposit recovery form, please notify our support team.
